metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0193 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In Apache Solr, the DataImportHandler, an optional but popular module to pull in data from databases and other sources, has a feature in which the whole DIH configuration can come from a request's "dataConfig" parameter. The debug mode of the DIH admin screen uses this to allow convenient debugging / development of a DIH config. Since a DIH config can contain scripts, this parameter is a security risk. Starting with version 8.2.0 of Solr, use of this parameter requires setting the Java System property "enable.dih.dataConfigParam" to true.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2+dfsg-22').
